intro: Funastrum torreyi, commonly known as Torrey's funastrum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Polygonaceae. It is native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico, where it typically grows in rocky soils and open habitats. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, clustered leaves. Its flowers are usually greenish-white and appear in early spring. Funastrum torreyi is often found in dry, arid environments and is adapted to withstand periods of drought.
